channel.title: Docs on Programming Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Programming Lab

item.title: Setting Up Blog With Github Pages
item.description: Setting Up Blog With Github Pages and Hugo # Hugo is a static site generator that lets us create sites very fast. Install hugo from installation page of hugo. Follow appropriate steps need to instal it. We also need git to be installed. Make sure git is setup in the system. Generating new site with hugo hugo new site <site_name> Example: hugo new site sample-site cd sample-site Adding theme. We can add any theme we want.

item.title: Stopped Using Notion
item.description: Why I stopped using Notion for everything # Notion is an all in one note taking app. It started as so, but I think now it has growen more than that. I was a notion fanatic, had my complete life setup in notion. My daily task, bookmark of websites, TV-shows, books and much more. I started using notion to organize thing in my life, whatever I did, used to update that in notion.
